attributes.action: To Amend Clause 17 of the UK Borders Bill
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government is using a deliberate policy of destitution to try to force people refused asylum to leave the country. 
 
Right now we are seeking to amend Clause 17 of the UK Borders Bill that is progressing through Parliament. The amendment ensures that people refused asylum have access to support while they are in the UK and will therefore no longer be destitute.
